name.ja: <ruby>七<rt>しち</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>じん</rt></ruby>－<ruby>毘<rt>び</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>か</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: If you have a monster with 2700 DEF or "Ship of Seven Treasures" in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Level 7 monsters on your field] x 400 until the end of this turn.
